entry.title: Grant-Lee Phillips: ‘She Knows Me’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Grant-Lee Phillips: ‘She Knows Me’

 Best New Music

Iconic troubadour Grant-Lee Phillips —best known for his songwriting achievements with 1990s band Grant Lee Buffalo—is just weeks away from dropping his 12th solo LP In The Hour of…

Aug. 18

entry.title: Hermanos Gutiérrez: ‘Elegantly Wasted (feat. Leon Bridges)’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Hermanos Gutiérrez: ‘Elegantly Wasted (feat. Leon Bridges)’

 Best New Music

What do you get when Hermanos Gutiérrez teams up with Leon Bridges ? “Elegantly Wasted,” the Ecuadorian-Swiss, guitar wizard brother duo’s first song ever to feature English lyrics.

Aug. 15

entry.title: Rebounder + Sofie Royer: 'Tennis Bracelet’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Rebounder + Sofie Royer: 'Tennis Bracelet’

 Best New Music

Sofie Royer spent a long time as the opening act for NYC multi-instrumentalists Rebounder . Naturally, they decided to join forces on the sexy new single “Tennis Bracelet.”

Aug. 14

entry.title: Yola: ‘Amazing’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Yola: ‘Amazing’

 Best New Music

Yola hit the music scene hard and fast with her 2019 debut, Walk Through Fire.

Aug. 13

entry.title: múm: ‘Mild At Heart’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
múm: ‘Mild At Heart’

 Best New Music

History of Silence (due Sept. 19) is the first new album from Icelandic outfit múm since 2013’s Smilewood.

Aug. 12

entry.title: Yttling Jazz: ‘Illegal Hit” (feat. Joshua Idehen) (Edit) (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Yttling Jazz: ‘Illegal Hit” (feat. Joshua Idehen) (Edit)

 Best New Music

Yttling Jazz is the heavy-hitting project of Swedish producer and songwriter Björn Yttling ( Peter Bjorn & John ).

Aug. 11

entry.title: RAKEL: ‘rescue remedy’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
RAKEL: ‘rescue remedy’

 Best New Music

RAKEL is steadily becoming a singular presence in the Icelandic soundscape. Her debut album a place to be is part diary and part landscape.

Aug. 8

entry.title: Desert Friends: ‘Sonora’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Desert Friends: ‘Sonora’

 Best New Music

On Friday, Aug. 8), KCRW DJ Tyler Boudreaux is throwing a summer boogie down for the ages.
